channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Despelote’ Review (Xbox): For The Love Of The Game

item.title: New Samsung Update Spells End For Millions Of Galaxy Phones
item.description: Another Samsung Galaxy phone bites the dust.

item.title: ‘Borderlands 4’ Looks Fantastic After Listening To Fan Feedback

item.title: AI Model Training Is Changing. Is It A Step Toward Democratization?
item.description: The future of AI shouldn’t be about forcing people to pick between centralized models.

item.title: Every tactic…

item.title: Uncomfortable ideas
item.description: The ideas aren’t uncomfortable, we are. You don’t have to like the weather to acknowledge that it’s raining.
